        Returns a XYChart.Series plotting the top x number of routes per airport where routes are on the Y axis and airports are on the X axis using the information stored in an RouteList.
        Parameters:
        airportList - the airportList to plot data from
        top - an integer representing the top x number of routes to display
        Returns:
        the series containing the data
